com.dpsframework.core.engines

Class RBEngineJESSRouter

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.io.Writer
      • java.io.StringWriter
        • com.dpsframework.core.engines.RBEngineJESSRouter
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Closeable, java.io.Flushable, java.lang.Appendable, java.lang.AutoCloseable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    RBEngineJESS

    public class RBEngineJESSRouter
extends java.io.StringWriter
    A special PrintWriter Object connected to RBEngineJESS.
    Since:
    2015, update at: 2018-08-24
    Version:
    1.7 (Build.1814)
    Author:
    Francisco J. Aguayo (Leon University / IEEE Power & Energy Systems Society Member)
